hero.description: Full-width hero with large headline text, background image with gold triangle decorative overlay, and video play button

about.description: Two-column about section with title and CTA button on left, subtitle and description paragraphs on right

services.description: Expandable accordion-style services list with section title, icons, and descriptions that expand on click

approach.description: Dark background step-by-step process section with vertical divider, step tabs, and navigation arrows

partners.description: Partner/accreditation logos displayed in a horizontal row with left/right navigation arrows

case-studies.description: Two-column case study card grid with titles, dates, large images, and category tag badges on a light gray background

clients.description: Client logo carousel with left/right navigation arrows on the light gray background

footer.description: Dark three-column footer with newsletter subscription, business/careers contact details, and navigation links with copyright bar

--primary-color.description: Primary brand color (gold) used for headings, accents, subscribe button, and decorative elements

--secondary-color.description: Secondary brand color (near-black) used for header, approach section, and footer backgrounds

--accent-color.description: Accent color (slightly warmer gold) used for tag borders and subscribe button border

--surface-color.description: Surface color (off-white) used for active step indicators

--text-color.description: Primary text color (dark charcoal) for body text on light backgrounds

--text-light.description: Light text color used for text on dark backgrounds in the header, approach, and footer sections

--background-color.description: Page background color (white) for the hero and about sections

--background-dark.description: Dark background used for the header, approach/process, and footer sections

--background-section.description: Light gray background used for case studies and clients sections

--font-family.description: Primary font family used throughout the template (Light 300, Regular 400, SemiBold 600)
